title: Alkmaar in 1923 in color! [HD enhanced & AI colorized]

sources.title: Alkmaar in 1923 in color! [HD enhanced & AI colorized]
sources.description: Wonderful views of the picturesq city of Alkmaar in The Netherlands almost a century ago. Alkmaar is especially known for its cheese market and the cheese bearers in their white costumes. It is a middle-size town in the province of Noord-Holland. The town has been in existence since the middle ages. A mention of the town "Alcmere" already occurred in the year 1063. It lies at the "Noord Hollandsch kanaal", a canal that was dug in 1819 and opened around 1824. This canal is famous for its floating bridges. One of them can be seen in this film. This bridge is still in existence but has been moved upstream. Please press the CC captions button to see all the locations as the film progresses. Source unrestored B&W film: Beeld en Geluid The nice music (by Kako & Nakamura) is kindly provided by the Belgian pianist Franco Di Nitto: https://www.youtube.com/user/pianist626262 Timeline (Wie helpt er mee dit te verbeteren?): 00:00 Toren bij Hof van Sonoy 00:35 De Mient 01:02 Waagtoren 01:06 Gemeentehuis 01:53 Grote Sint-Laurenskerk 02:32 Interieur van de Grote Sint-Laurenskerk 02:55 Waagtoren 03:01 Ronddraaiende ruitertjes 03:12 Zij-aanzicht 03:30 Waagplein 03:38 Waaggebouw 03:50 Kaasmarkt met de Kaasdragers 03:58 De Kaaswaag 04:08 Kazen worden uitgeladen 04:38 Langestraat 04:50 Brug met zicht op 't Fnidsen 05:02 De Mient 05:09 De Kooltuin 05:15 Verdronkenoord 05:20 Luttik Oudorp 05:24 Accijnstoren met daarachter het Verdronkenoord 05:31 Bierkade kijkend naar de vlotbrug in het Noord Hollandsch kanaal 05:50 Vlotbrug over het Noordhollandsch Kanaal (bestaat niet meer) 06:00 Camera draait van Victoriepark naar de Eilandswal 06:11 Voormeer; stoomboot Alkmaar Packet van Cornelis Bosman 06:30 Einde. Email: ricksfilmrestoration@gmail.com
